professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in installation, configuration, database design, backup & recovery, performance tuning, query optimization, and data transformation services. Proficient in logical and physical database design, T-SQL queries, stored procedures, views, triggers, constraints, indexes, and constraints. Skilled in High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) solutions like SQL Server clustering, log shipping, mirroring, always on, and replication. Experienced in upgrades and data center migrations of SQL Server instances. Proficient in Windows Server Administration, Active Directory, Network, and SAN. Strong communication and problem-solving skills with ability to work independently or collaborate effectively in a team environment.

key_responsibilities: Installation and configuration of SQL Server instances.
Troubleshooting and resolution of complex database issues.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting

Microsoft SQL Server (2005, 2008, 2012, 2014, 2016)",
